overview: Small town lawyer, Harmon Cobb, defends a Nazi prisoner of war against murder charges. Set during World War II, Cobb has to contend with the difficulties of defending the devil when the town's only doctor (Barnard Hughes) dies while at "Camp Bremen" in the fictitious town of Bremen, Colorado.
tagline: When a German officer in a US Army POW camp in a rural American town is accused of murder, Harmon Cobb becomes his reluctant  counsel.
title: The Incident
